pkgmetadata.longdescription: # djutils## Tools for use within the django frameworkdjutils provides tools for common actions within the django framework.It includes tools for:- Administration interface- Cryptographics- Database interaction- Exceptions- HTTP Handling- IP-Address handling- Mixins for Classes## InstallationUse the python package manager pip to install djutils.```bashpip install djutils```## UsageJust an example how you could use the exceptions_to_http decorator.Each method defined in djutils has a small documentation with it.```pythonfrom djutils import http, exceptions@http.exceptions_to_http(exceptions.Error)def my_route(request): if request.POST: raise exceptions.Error("POST is not allowed", code="no_post", status_code=403) return "Hello World"```## LicenseGNU LGPLv2.1, see LICENSE## MaintainerThis package is maintained by Manuel Stingl.
